title: How to Write a Memoir in BitLife: Step-by-Step Guide

steps.title: Get famous.
steps.content: Get famous. The only way to write a memoir is to get famous. If your character is famous, they will have an extra bar under their stats called Fame, Reputation, or Respect. There are a few ways you can get famous in BitLife [1] X Research source : Become a model, actor, writer, game developer, musician, magician, reporter, influencer, or athlete Be born into a royal family Marry someone famous

steps.title: Tap on Activities > Fame.
steps.content: Tap on Activities > Fame . This option will only show up if you're famous, so there's no way to write a memoir without having some degree of fame.

steps.title: Tap on Book.
steps.content: Tap on Book . The description says "Write a book." While this doesn't specifically say memoir, writing a book counts as writing a memoir for challenges that require it, such as the Pushing Roses challenge. When you select Book , you may find that no publishing companies want to publish your book right now. If this happens, try aging up a year and try again. You can also try to increase your fame stat as well, as having low fame will make publishers less likely to want to publish your memoir. There is no age requirement to get your memoir published. The only requirement is that your character is famous.
